geometricLabyrinth.title: Geometric Labyrinth
geometricLabyrinth.failCondition:
Fail Side Missions 10 times 
Time limit expires
geometricLabyrinth.description:
This is Trinitas, an advanced training system meant to test an ARKS defender's overall level of skill. Use every ability available to you to reach the final area.
Enemies' levels will change depending on the player's level.

cannonballRumble.title: Cannonball Rumble
cannonballRumble.description: This is Trainia Advance, an advanced training system meant to test an ARKS defender's overall level of skill. Use every ability available to you to defeat the enemies and destroy the targets.

cannonballStrike.title: Cannonball Strike
cannonballStrike.description: This is Trainia Advance, an advanced training system meant to test an ARKS defender's overall level of skill. Use every ability available to you to defeat the enemies and destroy the targets.
